app.name: VIP User Notifier
app.short_description: This app shows an alert for a VIP user
app.long_description: This app shows an alert for a VIP user
app.installation_instructions:
Simply click install. The app comes with three options to set up:
1.Pick a tag to filter on
2. Enter the alert message to be displayed.
3. Choose if the alert is persistent or dissapears after 5 seconds.

vip_tag.label: Tag used for VIP user
vip_tag.helpText: Defaults to vip, can not be blank

message.label: Message to display
message.helpText: Defaults to 'This user is a VIP!', can not be blank
